name: IP Geolocation info
author: Whois XML API, LLC

sections.description:
Get a prompt review of the geolocation data regarding all IPs on a given web page.

The ‘IP geolocation Info’ plugin automatically creates a tooltip containing relevant geolocation information. It also provides a link to a public report on IP geolocation API website with regard to all the IPs both in the post text and the comments.

The tooltip is displayed when you hover the cursor over an IP address in the text. You can then carry out a more in-depth research into the IP’s geolocation by following the link on IP Geolocation API website.

The tooltips are integrated simultaneously, and the ‘IP Geolocation Info’ plugin will not modify any of the content. You can deactivate it whenever you need to and then all of the site’s texts will look exactly as before.

If you have any additional questions that have not been covered, please feel free to email us at support@whoisxmlapi.com. We will do our best to get back to you within 1 business day.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ip-geolocation-info directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Settings->IP Geolocation settings’ screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin without registration on your service

Yes, of course.
